copy:
As a self-taught web developer, I've cultivated strong skills in frontend development through dedicated self-study and various hands-on projects.
 With a particular interest in React, I'm versed in a number of web technologies - SCSS, Webpack, TypeScript, NodeJS, etc.
 I'm adept at researching and learning new technologies, which allows me to stay up-to-date with the web development world as it evolves.
 I'm currently looking for roles that will challenge me and help me grow as a developer.
